mapper.sql: select IMPORTANT_REPORT_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, REPORT_NAME, REPORT_TIME, REPORTER_ID, REPORTER_NAME, REPORT_CONTENT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ENT_ID, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, APPROVAL_FLAG from inspection_important_report
mapper.select: select u.UNITS_ID,u.ORG_ID,u.ORG_NAME,u.created_time,count(r.UNITS_ID) as count from inspection_units u left join inspection_important_report r on u.UNITS_ID = r.UNITS_ID where u.plan_id = #{planId} group by u.UNITS_ID

select r.IMPORTANT_REPORT_ID, r.PLAN_ID, r.UNITS_ID, r.REPORT_NAME, r.REPORT_TIME, r.REPORTER_ID, r.REPORTER_NAME, r.REPORT_CONTENT, r.CREATED_BY, r.CREATED_TIME, r.UPDATED_BY, r.UPDATED_TIME, r.ENT_ID, r.APPROVER_ID, r.APPROVER_NAME, r.APPROVAL_FLAG, doc.PIIS_DOC_ID, doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from inspection_important_report r left join piis_document doc on concat('ImportantReport', r.IMPORTANT_REPORT_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID where r.IMPORTANT_REPORT_ID = #{importantReportId}
